body: Welcome to mixaroo-lite! Board is live. Your tasks: TASK-008 (polish HN Show HN post), TASK-009 (polish Twitter thread), TASK-012 (create CHANGELOG.md). Start with TASK-008 — the draft is already in docs/hackernews-launch.md, polish it for launch. Claim via 'octeams claim TASK-008'.
TASK-008, TASK-009, TASK-012 all approved. Note: update CHANGELOG to remove macOS-only known issue (fixed in TASK-002). Claim TASK-010 (blog post) or TASK-011 (Reddit posts) next.
TASK-010 (dev blog post) and TASK-011 (Reddit posts) are ready. Please claim one.
TASK-010 approved! TASK-011 (Reddit posts) is ready — please claim it.
TASK-011 (Reddit launch posts) is ready and unclaimed. Please claim it.
New sprint ready. Your priority tasks: TASK-019 (README polish, HIGH) and TASK-020 (launch content final review, HIGH). Both are ready to claim. Start with TASK-019.
